titles.title: To amend the Internal Revenue Code of 1986 to make permanent the election to treat the cost of qualified film and television productions as an expense which is not chargeable to capital account.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR 8/4/2007 E1744-1745)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.
Referred to the Subcommittee on Trade.

bill.summary:
8/3/2007--Introduced.
Amends the Internal Revenue Code to make permanent the taxpayer election to expense qualified film and television production costs in the current taxable year.
